00028 typedef unsigned int Symmetry;

00031 inline static int hasSymmetry(Symmetry S, int s)
00032 {
00033   return (S >> s & 1);
00034 }
00035 
00036 inline static void setSymmetry(Symmetry* S, int s)
00037 {
00038   *S |= 1 << s;
00039 }
00040 
00041 
00042 // not very elegant, should use bitwise and
00043 inline static int hasAxialSymmetry(Symmetry S)
00044 {
00045   return (hasSymmetry(S, spherical) ||
00046           hasSymmetry(S, axial)  ||
00047           hasSymmetry(S, axial0) ||
00048           hasSymmetry(S, axial1) ||
00049           hasSymmetry(S, axial2) ||
00050           hasSymmetry(S, axial3) ||
00051           hasSymmetry(S, axial4) ||
00052           hasSymmetry(S, axial5) ||
00053           hasSymmetry(S, axial6) ||
00054           hasSymmetry(S, axial7) ||
00055           hasSymmetry(S, axial8) ||
00056           hasSymmetry(S, axial9));
00057 }
